about_the_game:
Kamikaze Lassplanes is a brand-new genre-defying action visual novel. The game is a blend of hand-drawn anime graphic tale and story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay.



Alba Trossé and Hannah Brandenburg are two powerful beings called Lassplanes.

Despite being two opposites, they both share a gift that is the Kingdom's last hope. Get to know them and decide who will become your companion in arms.

But will the gift prove to be a curse?



Become a pilot of the elite squadron of the Kingdom and participate in events that will determine the fate of the entire war.

Get close to the enigmatic Lassplanes to tame the blaze of war together while the fire of the true feeling is forged in its flames. Test yourself as a pilot in unique shoot-'em-up missions and master these incredible yet lethally dangerous machines.

Decide the fate of your kingdom and your heart.





Your choices matter:
  • Unlock various endings that will reveal different faces of Alba and Hannah.
  • Discover and collect a gallery of beautiful, hand-drawn ecchi illustrations.
  • Challenge yourself in Arcade mode and beat records.
  • Control the lethal Lassplanes in various missions set in a fully 3D environment.

content_descriptors.notes: Kamikaze Lassplanes is an action visual novel game in which you engage in a passionate romance with mysterious girls called Lassplanes. The game offers manga ecchi aesthetics, but it doesn't have fully adult content.

name: Kamikaze Lassplanes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Fly and fall for powerful Lassplanes! Discover a hand-crafted anime VN with story-driven arcade shoot-'em-up gameplay. Take part in a romantic story with drama and comedic elements set in a steampunk Kingdom filled with magic and torn by a brutal war. Decide the fate of your country and heart.
